instruction: My phone battery is low. Help me get it charged.

instruction: Fix the failing unit test test_parse_date in this repo.

instruction: Rotate the API key for service X and make sure prod stays up.

instruction: Assess feasibility of a new antiviral compound using in-silico screening and a small in-vitro assay.
